tool_description:
Convert HTML to Markdown and then to Gemtext. 

See https://rimu.geek.nz/a-html-to-gemtext-conversion-api/ for an overview of how to use it.

There is an endpoint to convert HTML straight to Gemtext without exposing the Markdown intermediate data or you can convert HTML -> Markdown and Markdown->Gemtext using more endpoints.
name: HTML to Gemtext or Markdown
title: HTML to Gemtext or Markdown

api_list.name: html2gmi
api_list.description:
Convert the supplied HTML into Gemtext, via Markdown as an intermediate step.

Options to control the HTML to Markdown phase are set in "html2md_options" while the Markdown to Gemtext phase is controlled by "md2gmi_options". See these pages for more documentation:

https://pypi.org/project/markdownify/
https://pypi.org/project/md2gemini/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com/html2gmi/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com/html2gmi/"

api_list.name: md2gmi
api_list.description: Convert Markdown to Gemtext. See https://pypi.org/project/md2gemini/ for options to control how the Gemtext is generated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com/md2gmi/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: html2md
api_list.description: Put the HTML to be converted in 'html' and see https://pypi.org/project/markdownify/ for details about the meaning of the other options.
api_list.code:

url = "https://html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com/html2md/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-gemtext-or-markdown.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
